testCase.name: AddProduct Component Tests - component should render input elements for product details
AddProduct Component Tests - fields should have initial empty or default values
AddProduct Component Tests - valid inputs should not show error messages and submit successfully
AddProduct Component Tests - should display error message when required fields are empty on submit
AddProduct Component Tests - should display error for invalid image URL
AddProduct Component Tests - should enforce correct constraints on stock, regular price, and sale price
AddProduct Component Tests - should display error for MRP greater than Sale Price
AddProduct Component Tests - should handle category selection change
AddProduct Component Tests - should not accept negative stock
AddProduct Component Tests - should not accept negative prices
VendorProfile - displays loading shimmer when loading
VendorProfile - displays profile data when available
